posts.post_content:
Picked this up and doesn't fit into my set (all PSA).  Asking SOLD net (OBO) including insured shipping (or add 3% for PP Goods).  

For those of you who use VCP, this exact card sold over the summer for $4,500.  Feel free to look it up and compare cert #'s.  

Thanks for looking!!  Feel free to PM with questions or offers.
accidentally posted it as a bat off and have corrected it to bat on.  Got carried away in my haste!  Sorry about that!

Hi Troy,

This card actually sold for the best offer price of $4500?

Thanks,
Jeff

Hi Jeff,

It did according to VCP and their website.  You can find the sale at topsportscards.com.  There's a scan there, too (at least it was last time I looked).  I'm not affiliated w/that site whatsoever.  I was just looking to see if I could figure out where it came from.

I picked it up at a show recently.  I was pretty surprised when I saw the certs matched, to say the least. 

Thanks!

Troy
